name: foundation-sites-template
description: Azion Website using the Basic template for a new Foundation for Sites project.

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean; npm run build; npm run jekyll-server
scripts.clean-static: rm -rf static/css static/font static/js static/templates stastic/trd3
scripts.clean: npm run clean-site && npm run clean-static
scripts.clean-doc: npm run clean-doc-en; npm run clean-doc-ptbr
scripts.cp-doc: npm run cp-doc-en; npm run cp-doc-ptbr
scripts.jekyll-server: npm run clean-site; bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --trace
scripts.jekyll-server-future: npm run clean-site; bundle exec jekyll serve --watch --trace --future
scripts.jekyll-build: npm run clean-site; bundle exec jekyll build --watch --trace

author: marketing@azion.com
